item.description:
Curious about the Innitou Ski Runner's & Rider's club and/or membership?

Stay at the club from Dec 12 – 14 to experience a ski/snowboard and social event filled weekend!

Friday night: Dec 12th - Arrive after 8pm & meet the club members over a welcoming reception

Saturday: Dec 13th - Ski Bretton Wood’s and demo ski/snowboard equipment and attend social events in the evening. Discount ticket for 12/13 only for club members and guests with a pass.

Sunday: Dec 14th - Hit the slopes again among the various mountains in the area for some early tracks or explore the quaint downtown shops of North Conway.

Innitou Club Lodging accommodations:

We have separate male and female bunkrooms, so guests will need to bring up their own bedding, bath towels, and toiletries. We have a full kitchen, but space is limited in the refrigerator and we have lots of essentials already for common use.

Guest lodge fees are $20 per night. Payment will be collected upon arrival. Additional costs for the weekend activities and meals is not included. Must be 21+ to stay at the club.

Contact Gina for more information and to RSVP by Dec 9th…space is limited so only serious responses is appreciated.

Additonal details will be forwarded out once we have a final head count.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be at the house to greet you upon arrival.

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: New Guest Weekend - Dec 12-14 in North Conway area
